channel.title: Vanguard: All news articles
channel.description: This feed offers nearly every article published on the Personal Investors area of Vanguard.com(R), including mutual fund updates, guidance on investing and personal finance, commentary from Vanguard leaders, and our weekly economic news roundup. You’ll find a wealth of valuable, timely information on topics such as retirement, college saving, financial planning, and the forces that drive the markets and the economy at large.

item.title: Economic Week in Review: Positive news offers hopeful signs
item.description: A summary of the major economic reports and a recap of the securities markets for the week.

item.title: Find out if your fund is declaring a dividend in June
item.description: Many Vanguard® mutual funds and ETFs will distribute quarterly income dividends in June 2009.
